attributes.action: Force MPs to declare a faith that may cause scientific conflicts such as Opus Dei
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the light of hidden expense claims,and Ruth Kelly's admission of links with Opus Dei,ministers should register their connection with bodies who may hold moral views which may influence their decisions.

timesonline.co.uk/tol/comment/columnists/matthew_parris/article507847.ece

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
